titles.title: To amend the Act establishing Golden Gate National Recreation Area to provide for the management of the Presidio by the Secretary of the Interior, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2442)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands Prior to Referral (Oct 26, 93).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-363.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 197.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 11/15/1993--Passed House amended. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into leases, at fair market rental, for all or part of the Letterman-LAIR complex at the Presidio of San Francisco, California, for scientific, research, or educational uses. Requires the Secretary to use the proceeds from such leases for the preservation, restoration, and operation expenses incurred with respect to Presidio properties.
